author: nflaig
content: This image `ethpandaops/lodestar:focil-eb033fd` works with 6 second slot times now, I used `sibkatya/reth:focil-0e41c92` as reth image, I haven't been able to get it to work with geth, <@845691100072509460> might be similar issue as with bal testing or maybe it's not yet rebased on top of osaka?

author: jih2nn
content: Which Geth image are you using? I guess we're not using the latest engine APIs yet so `jihoonsg/geth-focil:dffb273`?

author: jih2nn
content: If the Fulu rebased one works with Reth, then how about using Geth for testing the latest engine APIs? That's actually the latest Geth status and we could use this image: `jihoonsg/geth-focil:1a1adcd`.

author: nflaig
content: yes was using that one, will give `jihoonsg/geth-focil:1a1adcd` a try

author: jih2nn
content: FYI, that one doesn't have UpdatePayloadWithIL method

author: nflaig
content: we are not using it anymore, we pass ILs via fcu

author: jih2nn
content: Very nice! Geth hasn't tested so I wouldn't argue it's bullet-proof. Let me know how it goes!
